ingredients: 2 slices whole grain bread,   +   1/2  avocado, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, or more to taste, 1 teaspoon Meyer lemon juice, or to taste,   +   1/4 teaspoon Meyer lemon zest, 1 pinch cayenne pepper, 1 pinch fine sea salt,   +   1/4 teaspoon chia seeds
nutrition: Total Fat 1g 2%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 271mg 12%, Total Carbohydrate 12g 4%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 2g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 3mg 13%, Calcium 31mg 2%, Iron 3mg 14%, Potassium 82mg 2%
